title: Can't log out of League account (on website)
body: So I used this account for something apparently, and the reason I have it was to help some friends new to the game so they didn't have to fight higher lvls, now that they are getting better I can use my normal account, but I can't log out of this one on the website. I need my memes and games, man.

replies.body:
Ah, I have fixed it on google chrome by deleting the cookies for it.

> -Go to the settings for Google Chrome
> -Open advanced settings
> -Go to privacy
> -Go to content settings
> -Go to all cookies and site data
> -Search for the league website(s)
> -Delete the cookies

Hope this helped for peeps who have this problem, cheers!

Hey BlazingFlares,

Appreciate you pointing this out, due to a misconfiguration a cookie wasn't getting properly deleted for a short time after a server transition earlier in the day. This has since been fixed and logout should work as expected :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Daguava,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oJ69Wjdq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T04:36:15.954+0000)
>
> Hey BlazingFlares,
> 
> Appreciate you pointing this out, due to a misconfiguration a cookie wasn't getting properly deleted for a short time after a server transition earlier in the day. This has since been fixed and logout should work as expected :)

Thanks for fixing it. I was a bit confused, haha. Nice work on fixing bugs quickly, riot team.
*also note that the reply with the fix is me on my normal account
